about_the_game:
Nelly Cootalot: Spoonbeaks Ahoy! - Artbook

The Artbook is a 21 pages PDF. A behind-the-scenes look at the creation of Nelly Cootalot: Spoonbeaks Ahoy! Featuring scribbly thumbnail sketches, recovered from ancient file-formats, and painstaking mouse-drawn artwork.

To access the Artbook from Steam: select 'Nelly Cootalot: Spoonbeaks Ahoy -> right click -> 'View Downloadable content' -> 'Local Files' -> 'Browse local files' -> 'Nelly Cootalot: Spoonbeaks Ahoy - Artbook' -> 'Spoonbeaks Ahoy Art Book.pdf'
